item.title: Automatic HTTPS Server using Caddy Reverse-Proxy on Google Kubernetes Engine
item.description: Easy HTTPS It has always frustrated me that even the largest companies like Microsoft have had HTTPS certificate renewal issues. With the invention of technologies like Let’s Encrypt people can finally not have to pay a fortune for certificates, and renew using its API. To make this process even easier, there are web server’s like Caddy that implement this for you. There is no excuse anymore, just do HTTPS from the start.
